Interface RaceService

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Service
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    RaceServiceImpl

    public interface RaceService
extends Service
    Provides operations for race-interaction with dao-layer.

    1.0
    Author:
    Alexey Kardychko
